rows: CREATE TABLE "user" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, "name" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE "product" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, "owner_id" INTEGER NOT NULL, "name" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "description" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "price" REAL NOT NULL, "quantity" INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("owner_id") REFERENCES "user" ("id"))
CREATE TABLE "tag" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, "name" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE "producttag" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, "product_id" INTEGER NOT NULL, "tag_id" INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("product_id") REFERENCES "product" ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("tag_id") REFERENCES "tag" ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "transaction" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, "buyer_id" INTEGER NOT NULL, "bought_product_id" INTEGER NOT NULL, "quantity" INTEGER NOT NULL, "total_price" REAL NOT NULL, "bought_at" DATETIME NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("buyer_id") REFERENCES "user" ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("bought_product_id") REFERENCES "product" ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "user_address" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, "user_id" INTEGER NOT NULL, "street" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "postal_code" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "city" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "user" ("id"))

CREATE TABLE "user_billing" ("id" INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, "user_id" INTEGER NOT NULL, "card_type" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "card_number" INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("user_id") REFERENCES "user" ("id"))
